channel.title: Name change - lapah
channel.description:
Hello everyone! Right now my artist name is lapah, but I am thinking of changing that name. I don’t have a very big fanbase at all (8 followers on soundcloud) so the problem isn’t how I am going to change it but to what.
Anyways, I have an idea about what I should change it to so please let me know what you think about it... I am thinking of changing it to L.E.A.F and have one word for each initial. Just a random example: Light Everything Around Fire... JUST A RANDOM EXAMPLE. But please help me and come up with some L.E.A.F ideas below. Anything is appreciated.
If you want to you can give me name ideas but mostly I want you to say what you think about my L.E.A.F idea and give me some L.E.A.F ideas. Sorry for my bad formulation, but this is the best I can.
Thanks!

item.title: Name change - lapah
item.dc:creator: lapah
item.description:
Wow that is actually very cool, but I don’t think that I will change my name anymore.

But cool idea!

Read full topic

item.title: Name change - lapah
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
D.R.O.I.D.

Destructive Robot Of Impending Doom

Read full topic

item.title: Name change - lapah
item.dc:creator: lapah
item.description:
Ok, so I like lapah but the thing is that I’m pretty sure that it has no backstory or meaning, so idk.

But thanks for the feedback, I might keep my name (probably) now when I think about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Name change - lapah
item.dc:creator: tornait
item.description:
Yeah, changing your name to an acronym doesn’t really make sense, especially if it’s gonna be a backronym. As far as I’m concerned, it seems like you’re just following a larger trend.

Read full topic

item.title: Name change - lapah
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
For what it’s worth, I don’t think Lapah is bad at all, especially if it has some back story.

I think there is quite a bit you could do with the name and a logo.

Read full topic

item.title: Name change - lapah
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Welp, where did lapah come from and what does it mean?

Read full topic
